commitSummariser.aiCommand.markdownDescription:
Custom AI command for commit summarization. Leave empty to use `copilot -p` (default).

**Default:** `copilot -p "Explain this commit in detail: <commit-text>"`

**Custom Examples:**
```json
// Full path to copilot
"/usr/local/bin/copilot -p"

// Alternative AI tools
"ollama run llama2"
"claude"
```

*Note: The command will receive the prompt as a quoted argument*
